name: StarDie Valley
description:
Stardie Valley

Your distant grandpa died and left his lands for you to manage.
But there's just one problem:
You hate farms.

Play 15 different levels on 3 different worlds to reach the maximum stars per level. Buy the tools, destroy the scenery and became the best farm-hater of the world on this casual and quick game.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Mouse Left Button - Action, Destroy
Mouse Right Button - Tool selection
Space - Active the power up

Credits:

Programmer - Antônio

2d Artist - Kauê

UI Designer - Rafael
